program: Civicorps Schools (formerly East Bay Conservation Corps)
description:
The Civicorps Academy serves young adults ages 18 to 24 through a combination of on-the-job training in environmental improvement projects and formal classroom instruction.  Civicorps is dedicated to promoting youth development through environmental stewardship and community service.  We seek to improve young people?s academic skills and knowledge, increase their sense of civic and environmental responsibility, foster their sense of caring toward others, and build their capacity to improve their own lives and to actively contribute to a democratic way of life.  

Civicorps also maintains a charter elementary school, serving students in grades K-5. In brief, the Civicorps Elementary School emphasizes three kinds of literacy ? academic, artistic and civic; and educates students for active and engaged citizenship in a pluralistic democracy.
